verses.verse: Let God <S%H430><s%> arise! <S%H6965><s%> Let his enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered! <S%H6327><s%> Let them who hate <S%H8130><s%> him also flee <S%H5127><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>

As smoke <S%H6227><s%> is driven away, <S%H5086><s%> so drive them away. <S%H5086><s%> As wax <S%H1749><s%> melts <S%H4549><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> so let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
But let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be glad. <S%H8055><s%> Let them rejoice <S%H5970><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Yes, <S%H7797><s%> let them rejoice with gladness. <S%H8057><s%>

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to God! <S%H430><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to his name! <S%H8034><s%> Extol <S%H5549><s%> him who rides <S%H7392><s%> on the clouds: <S%H6160><s%> to Yah, <S%H3050><s%> his name! <S%H8034><s%> Rejoice <S%H5937><s%> before him! <S%H6440><s%>
A father <S%H1><s%> of the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and a defender <S%H1781><s%> of the widows, <S%H490><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H4583><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> sets <S%H3427><s%> the lonely <S%H3173><s%> in families. <S%H1004><s%> He brings out <S%H3318><s%> the prisoners <S%H615><s%> with singing, <S%H3574><s%> but the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in a sun-scorched <S%H6707><s%> land.
God, <S%H430><s%> when you went forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> when you marched <S%H6805><s%> through the wilderness. <S%H3452><s%>.. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> trembled. <S%H7493><s%> The sky <S%H8064><s%> also poured <S%H5197><s%> down rain at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of <S%H2088><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>â€” at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
You, <S%H430><s%> God, sent <S%H5130><s%> a plentiful <S%H5071><s%> rain. <S%H1653><s%> You confirmed <S%H3559><s%> your inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> when it was weary. <S%H3811><s%>
Your congregation <S%H2416><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> therein. <S%H430><s%> You, God, prepared <S%H3559><s%> your goodness <S%H2896><s%> for the poor. <S%H6041><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> announced <S%H5414><s%> the word. <S%H562><s%> The ones who proclaim <S%H1319><s%> it are a great <S%H7227><s%> company. <S%H6635><s%>
"Kings <S%H4428><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> flee! <S%H5074><s%> They flee! <S%H5074><s%>" She who waits <S%H5116><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> divides <S%H2505><s%> the spoil, <S%H7998><s%>

while you sleep <S%H7901><s%> among the campfires, <S%H8240><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a dove <S%H3123><s%> sheathed <S%H2645><s%> with silver, <S%H3701><s%> her feathers <S%H3671><s%> with shining <S%H3422><s%> gold. <S%H2742><s%>
When the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> scattered <S%H6566><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in her, <S%H7949><s%> it snowed on Zalmon. <S%H6756><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H430><s%> are majestic mountains. <S%H2022><s%> The mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> are rugged. <S%H1386><s%>

Why do you look <S%H7520><s%> in envy, <S%H1386><s%> you rugged mountains, <S%H2022><s%> at the mountain <S%H2022><s%> where God <S%H430><s%> chooses <S%H2530><s%> to reign? <S%H3427><s%> Yes, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh will dwell <S%H7931><s%> there forever. <S%H5331><s%>

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are tens of thousands <S%H7239><s%> and thousands <S%H7239><s%> of thousands. <S%H8136><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> is among them, <S%H5514><s%> from Sinai, into the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

You have ascended <S%H5927><s%> on high. <S%H4791><s%> You have led away <S%H7628><s%> captives. <S%H7628><s%> You have received <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> among men, <S%H120><s%> yes, <S%H5637><s%> among the rebellious also, <S%H3050><s%> that Yah God <S%H430><s%> might dwell there. <S%H7931><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H136><s%> who daily <S%H3117><s%> bears <S%H6006><s%> our burdens, <S%H410><s%> even the God who is our salvation. <S%H3444><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
God <S%H410><s%> is to us a God <S%H410><s%> of deliverance. <S%H4190><s%> To Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> the Lord, <S%H136><s%> belongs escape <S%H8444><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> will strike <S%H4272><s%> through the head <S%H7218><s%> of his enemies, <S%H341><s%> the hairy <S%H8181><s%> scalp <S%H6936><s%> of such a one as still <S%H1980><s%> continues in his guiltiness. <S%H817><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will bring you again <S%H7725><s%> from Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> I will bring you again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>

That you may crush them, <S%H4272><s%> dipping your foot <S%H7272><s%> in blood, <S%H1818><s%> that the tongues <S%H3956><s%> of your dogs <S%H3611><s%> may have their portion from your enemies. <S%H341><s%>"
They have seen <S%H7200><s%> your processions, <S%H1979><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> even the processions <S%H1979><s%> of my God, <S%H410><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> into the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

The singers <S%H7891><s%> went before, <S%H6923><s%> the minstrels <S%H5059><s%> followed after, <S%H310><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ladies <S%H5959><s%> playing with tambourines, <S%H8608><s%>
"Bless <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the congregations, <S%H4721><s%> even the Lord <S%H136><s%> in the assembly <S%H4726><s%> of Israel! <S%H3478><s%>"

There is little <S%H6810><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> their ruler, <S%H7287><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> their council, <S%H7277><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>
Your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> your strength. <S%H5797><s%> Strengthen, <S%H5810><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> that which <S%H2098><s%> you have done for us. <S%H6466><s%>
Because of your temple <S%H1964><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> shall bring <S%H2986><s%> presents to you. <S%H7862><s%>

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> the wild animal <S%H2416><s%> of the reeds, <S%H7070><s%> the multitude <S%H5712><s%> of the bulls, <S%H47><s%> with the calves <S%H5695><s%> of the peoples. <S%H5971><s%> Being humbled, <S%H7511><s%> may it bring bars <S%H7518><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%> Scatter <S%H967><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%> that delight <S%H2654><s%> in war. <S%H7128><s%>
Princes <S%H2831><s%> shall come out <S%H857><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> shall hurry to stretch out <S%H7323><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> you kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth! <S%H776><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to the Lord! <S%H136><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

To him who rides <S%H7392><s%> on the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> which are of old; <S%H6924><s%> behold, <S%H5414><s%> he utters his voice, <S%H6963><s%> a mighty <S%H5797><s%> voice. <S%H6963><s%>
Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> to God! <S%H430><s%> His excellency <S%H1346><s%> is over Israel, <S%H3478><s%> his strength <S%H5797><s%> is in the skies. <S%H7834><s%>

You are awesome, <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> in your sanctuaries. <S%H4720><s%> The God <S%H410><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> and power <S%H5797><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%> Praise <S%H1288><s%> be to God! <S%H430><s%>
